= How to install smartVISU on a Webserver =

== Introduction ==

Ist quite easy to install smartVISU on a Webserver. 

== Details ==

To run smartVISU on your system you need the following prerequisites:
 * EIBD
 * LinKNX
 * webserver with PHP 5.2.4 (f.e. Apache2)

Download the latest version of smartVISU from the download section. Extract the ZIP file and move the extracted content to your webserver.
